languages.text: {n}Младшие члены дома Версериан изучают записку в руках Клеменции вместе с ней. Беспокойство и недоумение охватывает всех присутствующих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Младшие члены дома Версериан изучают записку в руках Клеменции вместе с ней. Беспокойство и недоумение охватывает всех присутствующих.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Младшие члены дома Версериан изучают записку в руках Клеменции вместе с ней. Беспокойство и недоумение охватывает всех присутствующих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family are examining the note in her hands together with her. Everyone present is engulfed in anxiety and bewilderment.{/n}
{n}The younger members of the Werserian family are examining the note in her hands together with her. Everyone present is engulfed in anxiety and bewilderment.{/n}

{n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアの手にあるメモを見ようと、ウェルザリアン家の若者たちが群がる。その場にいる全員が、不安と困惑に包まれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアの手にあるメモを見ようと、ウェルザリアン家の若者たちが群がる。その場にいる全員が、不安と困惑に包まれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}韦尔森家族的年轻人围了过来，看着克莱门缇雅手里的字条，每个人都流露出焦虑与困惑的神情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}韦尔森家族的年轻人围了过来，看着克莱门缇雅手里的字条，每个人都流露出焦虑与困惑的神情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Clémentia prend la note, et les membres les plus jeunes de la famille se rassemblent autour d'elle pour l'examiner. Tous semblent aussi inquiets que perplexes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia prend la note, et les membres les plus jeunes de la famille se rassemblent autour d'elle pour l'examiner. Tous semblent aussi inquiets que perplexes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los miembros más jóvenes de la familia Werserian se reúnen en torno a Clementia para examinar la nota que sujeta. Todos los presentes están consternados y perplejos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los miembros más jóvenes de la familia Werserian se reúnen en torno a Clementia para examinar la nota que sujeta. Todos los presentes están consternados y perplejos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die jüngeren Mitglieder der Familie Werserian beäugen neugierig die Notiz in Clementias Händen. Alle Anwesenden wirken besorgt und verwirrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die jüngeren Mitglieder der Familie Werserian studieren gemeinsam mit ihr die Notiz, die sie in ihren Händen hält. Alle Anwesenden sind so nervös wie verdattert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Werserian Hanesi'nin genç mensupları, Clementia'nın elindeki kâğıtta yazanları okumak için etrafında toplanıyor. Herkes endişe ve şaşkınlık içinde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The younger members of the Werserian family crowd around to examine the note in Clementia's hands. All present are beset with worry and bewilderment.{/n}
